statement.p: In 23.81 of the last 42 days it rained. How many days did it not rain? days

solution.p: We recall that a percent as a decimal is part/whole. Here that is \displaystyle\frac{{P}}{{42}}={0.2381}. We solve for P by multiplying by \displaystyle{42}. \displaystyle{P}={0.2381}\cdot{42}={10.0002}. We round that as requested to 10 to find the days it rained. How many days did it NOT rain?
